name: nodeangularfullstack
description: Full-stack application with Angular frontend and Express backend

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.docker:test: docker-compose exec -T api npm test && docker-compose exec -T web npm test
scripts.docker:test:all: npm run docker:test && npm run docker:test:integration
scripts.docker:lint: docker-compose exec -T api npm run lint && docker-compose exec -T web npm run lint
scripts.docker:lint:api: docker-compose exec -T api npm run lint
scripts.docker:lint:web: docker-compose exec -T web npm run lint
